title: (x) London 2012 identity font - 2012 Bold Six (custom typeface) {Nick Job}
content:
your starter for 10

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [\_43012939\_olympic\_pink.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111120827/http:/typophile.com/files/_43012939_olympic_pink.jpg) | 11.2 KB |
author: miles

comments.content:
I'm fairly sure they said it was all custom made after "a lot of research".  
It's also very ugly in my humble opinion:)

Miles, I respect your work as a font designer, but don't you think you could choose a more dignified, or polite, icon to use for this forum?

- Mike Yanega

For shame. I will miss her (and them) dearly.

hhp
I thought it was pretty funny, kinda in a tongue-in-cheek way, but I can understand not everyone can appreciate her... errr... them... err...

Plus it's not easy making an animation like that, that cleanly, in bitmaps.  
I think Mike understimated the <cite>truly massive</cite>... uh, effort it represented.

hhp
